title: Amid Joy in Kherson, a Humanitarian Disaster Looms
description: Ukrainian forces encountered a city without heat, water, electricity or cellphone service, with Russian artillery digging in just miles away.
dc:creator: Andrew E. Kramer, Marc Santora and Katie Rogers
media:credit: Lynsey Addario for The New York Times
media:description: Ukrainian civilians and soldiers celebrated the Russian retreat from Kherson on Saturday, though hard times may lie ahead.
